{/* Overview / Top */}
{/* Intro */}

AI-crypto radar

Ride signals, not noise.

Spot momentum early, track narratives, and publish in minutes.

{/* CHANGED: primary CTA uses brand gradient */} Get Early Access See How it Works
{/* HOW IT WORKS */}

How it works

{/* Ingest */}
{/* cloud arrow */}

Ingest

Stream newest AI-crypto tweets & on-chain/news signals.

{/* Understand */}
{/* brain */}

Understand

Sarcasm-aware sentiment + theme/topic clustering + trend labels.

{/* Act */}
{/* rocket */}

Act

Agentic post generator & scheduled threads—review, edit, publish.

{/* CORE FEATURES */}

Core features

Real-time Radar

Sub-second tweet ingestion; token aliases normalized.

Sentiment Engine

Ignores neutrals; token-level trend label (Good/Bad/Neutral).

Theme & Topic Mapping

Word clouds + topic tags per token.

Agentic Post Studio

Single post, thread, or video with full hashtags, tweet & caption.

{/* INSIGHTS GALLERY */}

Insights gallery

{/* NEAR narrative spike */}

NEAR narrative spike

{/* tiny sparkline (cyan) */}
  • • Mentions +240% in 6h
  • • Sentiment flips to “Good”
{/* RNDR funding chatter */}

RNDR funding chatter

  • • VC mentions +3 sources
  • • Neutral to “Good” drift
{/* FET controversy cool-off */}

FET controversy cool-off

  • • Negativity −35% w/w
  • • Mentions normalize

{/* USE CASES */}

Use cases

{/* Trader */}
{/* CHANGED: brand chip */} Trader

Catch momentum early

Spot moves fast, filter by tokens/themes, and react to sentiment in minutes.

{/* Research */}
Research

Track narratives & synthesize

Compare themes, surface top tweets, and export snapshots for weekly notes.

Join the Waitlist

Fund

Monitor sectors at a glance

Build watchlists, track sector flows, and generate LP updates instantly.

{/* SECURITY */}

Security & compliance

  • {/* shield-check */} Non-custodial: we never hold your funds.
  • {/* lock */} API keys are stored securely (env) and never logged.
  • {/* users */} Role-based access planned for team workspaces.
  • {/* clipboard-check */} Audits: integrations reviewed; formal audits planned.
  • {/* scale */} Disclaimers: TrendAI provides analytics only, not financial advice.
  • {/* shield */} Privacy: personal data minimized by design.
{/* PRICING */}

Pricing

{/* billing toggle */}
{/* FAQ */}

FAQ

What is TrendAI?

A platform to track AI-crypto narratives, sentiment, and generate on-brand social content.

How often is data refreshed?

We scan continuously and surface fresh signals; dashboards update throughout the day.

Do you support watchlists and alerts?

Watchlists and alerts are on the roadmap. Join the waitlist to get early access.

{/* CONTACT / WAITLIST */}

Join the waitlist

Be the first to try new features and dashboards.
